description: This table contains documentation regarding follow-up actions for tissue implants.

columns.name: IMPLANT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the implant record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: TISSUE_FOLLOW_UP_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item is used to document follow-up status after a tissue has been implanted in a patient.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined
